FuncDef: This command configures the subnet that will be used for the l2aware-subscriber. This subnet is only locally significant and can overlap with other subscribers. The subnet is derived by ignoring the host-bits of the ip-address. The ip address specifies the default gateway that will be signaled in DHCP along with the netmask derived from the prefix-length.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IP prefix and prefix length.
